alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:57AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Aitkin, northwestern Carlton and east central Crow Wing Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Cuyuna, to near Aitkin, to near Malmo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Locations impacted include... Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, McGregor, Palisade, Big Sandy Lake, Tamarack and Libby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
